title: From Dusk Till Dawn - The Video Game
description:
From Dusk Till Dawn

Seth Gecko, sole survivor of the cult-action film &#039;From Dusk Till Dawn&#039; 
is sentenced to death in the place of his brother, and has 72 hours 
left to live. He is innocent, but nobody will believe him... 
  
Surrounded by vampires, Seth will find it very difficult to survive. 
With the help of the few remaining human survivors and armed with raw 
combat artillery, Seth might make it through the night... 
  
An innocent man, sentenced to death, on a high security prison ship... 
Overrun by blood thirsty vampires...

 GAME FEATURES:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Based on the cult action film
- 19 weapons, including M9 and paralyzing guns, a sander and a circular saw, 
and flash grenades...
- Destroyable backgrounds with &#039;Intelligent&#039; specific effects.
- 20 hellishly challenging levels.
- Original new music mixed with soundtrack from the movie.
- Motion Slow and Motion Stop for special effects. 

Review: <a href="
http://www.gamespot.com/pc/action/fromdusktilldawn/index.html?tag=result;title;0" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gamespot.com/pc/action/fromdusktilldawn/index.html?tag=result;title;0</a>
